Math and Code Formatting

Lagrange comes out of the box with MathJax and syntax highlighting through fenced code blocks. MathJax allows you to display mathematical equations in your posts through the use of LaTeX. Syntax highlighting allows you to display source code in different colors and fonts depending on what programming language is being displayed. As always, Jeky...
